name: Highway Rider City Motor Racing 3D
description:
"Ride your motorcycle in the endless busy roads and highways! Brings to you one of the most compelling and satisfying traffic dodging experience in the world! Be careful, when racing with fast speed

Prove your skills of racing as fast as you can, tilt the motor, ride left or right to avoid the coming cars. modified and keep motorcycles. to be the high-performance.
Customize the motorcycle you like, choose favorite color and slap on well-designed decals. Upgrade your ride speed, Enjoy extremely graphics and experience high-octane racing!

Moto Rider Features:
-Free to play
-Best moto rider game
-Choose the moto bike you like and keep performance
- Great 3D graphics
-Racing left or right to avoid coming cars traffic rush and avoid fall
-Ride your motorbike in different scenary
-Get more and more coins
-Racing as fast as you can in city traffic
-Endless Rider fun

Moto rider has already began, what are you waiting for, quickly download the Free to Play Game and Link your Mind to Refresh "
